rows.label: bf11670100_0010
rows.name:
It may be this is exactly what they wanted.
Become Divine Beasts, have a longer life with humans...

rows.label: bf11670100_0040
rows.name:
Oh, nothing.
I was just remembering the previous time you said that.

rows.label: bf11670100_0070
rows.name: And what do you think you said?

rows.label: bf11670100_0090
rows.name:
I don't wish for "forever".
All I want is my life with her. That's plenty.

rows.label: bf11670100_0100
rows.name:
Spoken like a true Blade.
No one can begrudge you that.

rows.label: bf11670100_0110
rows.name: I wonder how it was for you...

rows.label: bf11670100_0120
rows.name:
Well, honestly...
I suppose I may well have been just like you, Shin

rows.label: bf11670100_0150
rows.name: Being like this isn't so bad either.

rows.label: bf11670100_0160
rows.name:
After some years, or centuries,
you find yourself ready for new relationships.
